## Plotting with Python

This is a simple plot generated using Python.

```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# Create some data
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

# Plot the data
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.title('Sine Wave')
plt.xlabel('x')
plt.ylabel('sin(x)')
plt.grid(True)

# Save the plot as an image
plt.savefig("plot.png")
plt.show()
